name: The Legendary Mechanic
author: 齐佩甲
content: Han Xiao, a veteran player of the game &quotGalaxy&quot died unexpectedly in the middle of doing a leveling request. He was transmitted to the game world ten years earlier and became an NPC with a player&#039s panel and was reborn in the base of the game&#039s villain. In order to survive, Han Xiao resolutely chose the &quotMechanic&quot occupation and concentrated on cultivation.
